title: Rice and Cooked Rice
body:
I propose a new token farm that yields rice. All users of Jiaozi who started using Jiaozi before a given block number or before October 8th should get an air drop of 1,000,000 grains of rice. Like Jiaozi, rice can be cooked into cooked rice. Unfortunately, our Chads are very clumsy and so a lot of rice gets spilled and lost forever. Cooked rice and Baked Jiaozis come together to make a platter which can earn rice or jiaozis for example. Maybe 4 Baked Jiaozis and 10,000 grains of rice per platter. It should be a long term goal of building tokens into higher denominations and combinations. If there are many steps to get to a token, many people will want to save gas and time and just purchase the higher denominations, even if it is more expensive to do it that way. Finally, we should have a plan to build games and dapps that use the highest denominations and have built in 'burn' functions. 

Night Hawk
author: 0xAb8bF2c3393f53A4c2CfaB15dc5DA3C7A0F43ABB
